item.title: Choose Your Consciousness: Falsehood or Truth
item.description:
Choose Your Consciousness: Falsehood or Truth 

 The emotions of scorn, hate, craving (which is desire), anxiety, regret, despair, blame and humiliation are all the consciousness of falsehood.

item.title: Joy and Happiness are not created equal!
item.description: Joy and Happiness are not created equal!

item.title: One Simple Phrase That Can Bring You Joy, Peace and Happiness
item.description:
One Simple Phrase That Can Bring You Joy, Peace and Happiness

This article originally appeared on Completed Thoughts. I feel fortunate to be able to say that most of the time I feel happy and calm, and that is for many reasons. However, this was not always the case and there is one short little phrase which played a major role in transforming my life.

item.title: How can I Manifest Joy!?
item.description:
How can I Manifest Joy!? 

Close your eyes. 

 Begin by paying attention to your appetites, think twice before indulging in your desires.

item.title: Joy Is Truth
item.description:
Joy Is Truth 

Joy is a very high vibrational state of truth sandwiched between peace and love.
